AD_MasonApprentice_01.synopsis: There are two skeletons pinned on stakes vertically by Justiciars. They were the apprentices of Mason and now "reside" near the entrance to Masonry

AD_MasonApprentice_01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MasonApprentice_01_0.text: *Let this be a warning - those who defy Shar's will shall suffer darkness without her blessing.*
